name: Sacrifice Needed
description:
Sacrifice Needed is a retro FPS. You are playing as Jerry and your point is to retrieve your pumpkin. However You will have to destroy the monsters first...

Game was made in 3 days for Spooktober Game Jam.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Move:  WASD

Interact: LeftMouseButton

Shoot: LeftMouseButton

Jump: Space

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Music: Johnny

SFX: Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
